name: duct
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a tube or pipe that carries liquid or air, especially in and out of buildings or through the body: Most office buildings have dozens of air ducts and vents. People with blocked tear ducts cannot cry.

Parts of buildings: vents & ventilation

Add to word list
Add to word list
a tube or pipe in a building that carries liquid or air or protects wires: Air conditioning requires ventilating ducts.
A duct is also a narrow tube in the body that carries a liquid: tear ducts
